value:
$nMPID_オロチ|These feathers are from peacocks,
aren't they? Such a rare species—
you hardly ever see them in the wild.

$nMPID_オロチ|Kagero and I have been joined at the
hip since we were little. That's why
we work together so well!

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|It's not often that Orochi and I get to
attend a festival together. We'd best
make the most of it while we're here.

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|A ninja always has to know which
way the wind's blowing. Their very
survival depends on it.

$nMPID_オロチ|I think I just overheard someone call
me "immature." The gall! What about
ME says immature?!

$nMPID_オロチ|We made it, Kagero! The splendid
castle you see before you is where
$Nf's friend lives.

$nMPID_オロチ|Very good! The wind festival is off to
a roaring start!

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Keep it up, Orochi! Now we really
have the wind at our backs!
$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|I'm sorry, Orochi. I fell out of step.

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Thank you! Now we'll really kick up
some dust on the battlefield.

I am Kagero, and this is my friend
Orochi. We're here to celebrate the
wind festival!

$nMPID_オロチ|Ahh! Nothing to put the heart at ease
like a good festival.$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|True—provided you have the right
person by your side.$k$pI doubt I would have had nearly as
much fun without you here, Orochi.$k$p$nMPID_オロチ|Whoa there! Are you trying to make
me blush, Kagero?$k$pI agree, of course. You're my best
friend in the world, and that's the
sort of bond that never fades.$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Very true, my friend. There's no gale
strong enough to tear the two of
us apart.
$nMPID_二人|Vanish from our sight!
$nMPID_二人|We've sealed...your fate!
$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Faster than the wind...
$nMPID_オロチ|Dance on the breeze!
More training is required...
I have foreseen victory!
I'm here for you!
Like two peas... In a pod!
We won't fail. Indeed!
These outfits are bold. All the more reason to show off!
Aha!
We'll make a path.
Leave it to us.
$nMPID_オロチ|Aha! An auspicious sign...
$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|What is it, Orochi? Another divination?

$nMPID_オロチ|Exactly. I must discern how we'll
perform as a unit.

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Do we really need the cards for that?
We've been together since we
were little.

No one here knows you better than
I do.

$nMPID_オロチ|You just love to blurt things out,
don't you? Have a little tact...

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|I'm simply speaking the truth.
Don't tell me you're embarrassed
to hear it!

I've been carrying your smile with
me all this time, Orochi. I don't see
why I'd forget that now.

$nMPID_オロチ|That's enough with the gushy talk!
We're not kids anymore.

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Maybe not, but who's to say we
won't grow even closer as we
get older?

$nMPID_オロチ|Well, someday, we will be little
old ladies...but not today. I shudder
to think of it.

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Oh, it won't be that bad. Picture this:
the two of us enjoying the breeze on
the veranda as we sip some tea...

Peace has returned, and we're free
to relax and admire the cherry
blossoms... Won't that be nice?

$nMPID_オロチ|Well, when you put it that way,
I can't complain. I guess we will
be stuck with each other!

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Naturally. And don't even think
about getting killed out there.

$nMPID_オロチ|Perish the thought! Still, that's
enough woolgathering. We should
turn our attention to the fight.

$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Agreed. Our teamwork can't be
beaten...not in this battle, or any
other. Onward!
